ygData.subject: Re: Jewelery Roller coaster
ygData.msgSnippet: actually, I had them buy the rubies hehe, they handed me one, I handed them a mask, and so on.  They gave me a tip after of about 20palt per mask.
ygData.messageBody:
actually, I had them buy the rubies hehe, they handed me one, I handed
them a mask, and so on. They gave me a tip after of about 20palt per
mask.


> -----Original Message-----
> From: Tim Borelli [SMTP:timb@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, June 09, 1999 9:16 AM
> To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Jewelery Roller coaster
>
> From: Tim Borelli <timb@...>
>
> ruby masks? damn boy, where'd you get the rubies? (how much do they go
> for?) i spent the night commissioning silver jaded and silver star
> rose
> quartz (INT) rings, selling em for 10pp each, sometimes 15pp.
>
> Qorona Mindbender of the Volition Guild, 21st (or 20th, depending on
> if
> some ass trains a cyclops at me at the aviak village in s. karana or
> not)
> lvl enchanter on Cazic-Thule
>
>
> At 08:14 AM 6/9/99 -0500, you wrote:
> >From: "Hapke, Matthew" <mahapke@...>
> >
> >Well, I don't know how other jeweler' days went, but I spent the
> entire
> >night strapped to the Qeynos gate, making jewelery, and the surprise
> of
> >the night? Ruby masks! I would commission the work, they would buy
> the
> >gems. I made 7 masks last night at the cost of only silver to me, and
> >made approx 20plat per mask. Seems those high up characters with
> money
> >to burn don't have a lot of stuff for the face.
> >
> >---------------------------------------------------------------------
